OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_ID.description: The ID of the live stream to connect to.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_LISTEN_DELETE.description: Whether to listen for delete events on the live stream.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_NO_DEPENDENCIES.description: Whether to ignore dependencies when processing events from the live stream.

CROWDSTRIKE_CLIENT_ID.description: Crowdstrike client ID used to connect to the API.

CROWDSTRIKE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Crowdstrike client secret used to connect to the API.

CROWDSTRIKE_PERMANENT_DELETE.description: Select whether or not to permanently delete data in Crowdstrike when data is deleted in OpenCTI. If set to `True`, `CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_LISTEN_DELETE` must be set to `True`.

CROWDSTRIKE_FALCON_FOR_MOBILE_ACTIVE.description: Enable Android and iOS platform support.

METRICS_ENABLE.description: Whether or not Prometheus metrics should be enabled.

METRICS_PORT.description: Port to use for metrics endpoint.

METRICS_ADDR.description: Bind IP address to use for metrics endpoint.
